Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.PlayerAndComponents

Class LeaderProduction

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.PlayerAndComponents.ProductionPower
it.polimi.ingsw.model.PlayerAndComponents.LeaderProduction
public class LeaderProduction
extends ProductionPower
this class represent the storage for the resources that when given in input can generate a leader production this class will extend ProductionPower if and only if the player activate a NewProduction leader card

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    LeaderProduction​(Resource input, ProductionPower productionPower)
    this constructor initialise the list of resource with one resource, that should be resource of the first leader card activated

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void activateLeaderProduction​(int toActivate)
    this method activate the leader production if it exist, do nothing if the leader production does not exist.
    void addLeaderProduction​(Resource toAdd)
    this method add a new resource to use as input of a leader production
    Resource getInput​(int index)
    this method get the resource that will be used as the input for a leader production
    boolean isLeaderProductionActivated​(int toCheck)
    this method verify if the leader production associated with the index in input is active or not.
    void resetProductions()
    this method reset the productions for every card (counting leader ones) of the dashboard and the basic production, so that the turn after the owner of the card can activate them again
    java.lang.String toString()  

    Methods inherited from class it.polimi.ingsw.model.PlayerAndComponents.ProductionPower

    activateBasicProduction, activateProduction, checkPlacement, getCard, getNumOfCards, getPersonalCards, getVictoryPoints, isBasicProductionActivated, isProductionActivated, placeCard

  • Constructor Details

    • LeaderProduction

      public LeaderProduction​(Resource input, ProductionPower productionPower)
      this constructor initialise the list of resource with one resource, that should be resource of the first leader card activated
      Parameters:
      input - this is the input resource
      productionPower - this is the production power to copy in the father class

  • Method Details

    • getInput

      public Resource getInput​(int index)
      this method get the resource that will be used as the input for a leader production
      Overrides:
      getInput in class ProductionPower
      Parameters:
      index - this is the index of the resource that should be got, it should be between 1 and 2
      Returns:
      the resource associated with the input, null if the input is not correct

    • addLeaderProduction

      public void addLeaderProduction​(Resource toAdd)
      this method add a new resource to use as input of a leader production
      Overrides:
      addLeaderProduction in class ProductionPower
      Parameters:
      toAdd - this is the resource to add

    • activateLeaderProduction

      public void activateLeaderProduction​(int toActivate)
      this method activate the leader production if it exist, do nothing if the leader production does not exist. in particular, it simply set to true the attribute leaderProductionActivated associated with the index specified in input
      Overrides:
      activateLeaderProduction in class ProductionPower
      Parameters:
      toActivate - this is the index associated with the leader production to activate, it should be from 1 to 2

    • isLeaderProductionActivated

      public boolean isLeaderProductionActivated​(int toCheck)
      this method verify if the leader production associated with the index in input is active or not. the method always return false when the LeaderProduction doesn't exist
      Overrides:
      isLeaderProductionActivated in class ProductionPower
      Parameters:
      toCheck - this is the index associated with the leader production to activate
      Returns:
      true if the leader production has already been activated during the turn, false otherwise

    • resetProductions

      public void resetProductions()
      this method reset the productions for every card (counting leader ones) of the dashboard and the basic production, so that the turn after the owner of the card can activate them again
      Overrides:
      resetProductions in class ProductionPower

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class ProductionPower
